<<<<<<< HEAD
By the Lords Justices, a proclamation for publishing the peace between His Majesty and the French king England and Wales. Lords Justices.
1 broadside.
Printed at London, and re-printed at Edinburgh by the heirs and sucessors [sic] of Andrew Anderson ..., [Edinburgh] : 1697.
"Tho. Cantuar. J. Sommers, C. Sunderland, Dorset. Romney, Oxford." "Given at the court at Whitehall the eighteen day of October, 1697. In the ninth year of His Majesties reign." Reproduction of original in the British Library.
=======
